summary: We are hiring a Data Engineer to build and maintain data pipelines, support analytics, and ensure data quality for our growing platform.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain ETL pipelines using Python and SQL.
Optimize data models and support BI reporting.
Collaborate with analysts and product teams.
Document data flows and ensure data governance.
requirements_must_have: 2+ years of experience as a data engineer or similar role.
Experience with cloud data platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure).
Familiarity with ETL tools and data warehousing.
